title: cant lauch a league game
body: so i just got a new monitor that far better then my old one. i cant launch a league game thou. i can open it and join a lobby. when the game actually launches i get a error report mesg. idk why but when the game starts i see the league logo buts its like very tiny and it looks like it tries to lauch the game as 1/4 of the space on the screen and then just crashes

replies.body:
Thank you for letting me know you swapped out your monitor! This means the issue is likely tied to the configuration file saved server-side trying to pull an old resolution and causing the crash. I recommend completing a reset of your input file with the steps below to resolve this.

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these following files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, hop into a custom match to see if the reset worked! Let me know if this fixed the crashes you were experiencing. ^.^
